alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN BOTTINEAU COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 415 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Bottineau to near Souris to 6 miles north of Newburg. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bottineau, Souris, Gardena, Carbury, Lake Metigoshe State Park, Homen State Forest, Butte St. Paul State Recreation Area, Roth, Omemee and Pelican Point State Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
